reviewText: It doesn’t make any sense that my certificate for an online course depends on the availability of another student to evaluate my exercises.

SOS SOS SOS Hello I am really frustrated cause instead of paying just 44euro I was charged EVERY MONTH 44euro during 7!!! months for the the same course. I want my money back please as ap. Please help me get my money back cause THIS YEAR I have no job due to covid pandemia ....Sincere regardsPolina

I really enjoyed this course, it is very interesting for who studies English as a second language, but I suggest to fix some issues with tests, it is difficult to pass the last ones because there are a lot of bugs that doesn't let you choose the right answer.
the course is good for upgrading technical skills
It is a little exhausting doing the capstone but I will try it. The course helps to understand some possible scenarios we will face in a negotiation.

I particularly liked the topics about cross-cultural communication and from my point of view the focus of the course is on that, so the title could be "Cross-cultural communication in a business setting" or something along those lines, as the focus was not on the English language. I would be very glad to participate in a similar course done by these instructors. In my opinion there were too many peer-graded assignments.
the video lessons could be more explicit and elaborate.
best course for in our future
great course for non native speakers
Although some matters are presented quite broadly and generically, some others are exhaustive and of practical usage, especially the ones supported by documents and references: very useful!
I found the lessons on cultural aspects were very interesting and well instructed.
useful course, everyone should attend and learn skills .
Great course and very helpful and efficient, thank you very much all lectureres
I loved the course because it tough me so many things i didn't knew about how to interact with different cultures and make good business relationships with other cultures
It was very helpful because it helped me to broaden my perspective and see how other cultures communicate and do business
It combines the correct usage of english in a multicultural context.

I really enjoyed and learnt a lot during this course.  It was really interesting.  I really like to learn about different cultures and during this course there were many new aspects on how to understand cultures.  It was very useful.
It was an excellent and very helpful course for me. I`ve learned a lot about other business cultural communication, negotiation style, meeting and greeting.
Very interesting course, I learnt lot of things on cross-cultural frameworks that before I was not completely aware. Now I think I'm more prepared to manage the topics presented during the course.

This course was essential and very important, because I learned to relate in the best way with cultures from different countries, how to have correct communication and to understand the different ways in which other cultures understand each other.
A Wonderful Course To Boost Your Self Confidence
It was  awesome  learning from coursera and I completed my communication course within in no time through its experienced teaching.

This is a very important course for anyone who works in an international company. Also, this could give more understanding as to why foreigners act differently with us. This would somewhat open our eyes.
Helped me a lot in improving my business communication.
Learning here is an nice experience .They have  focused on the proper syllabus ,very well designed course .Must try it ,if want to improve your communication skills.
this course taught me cross-cultural communications ethic. will definitely recommend. great. thank you

In business contexts, we are not used to think about the culture differences, and this couse allowed me to realize how those differences can affect a negotiation. Now, I am aware about this and how to perform within a business context without misunderstandings.
An excellent course for the people who would like be a global citizen.
Really interesting, with good exercices too.

It has been a great
learning experience...I
learned common cultural theories and how  culture plays a key role in
shaping global business practices.
A very informative course that has enhanced my communication skills further particularly in the context of cross-culture communication.
I have learned a lot. Thank you to my instuctors.😊
THIS COURSE IS REALLY GREAT AND INTERESTING. THANK YOU.
IT WAS REALLY A FUN INTERACTIVE  COURSE WHICH HELPED ME POLISH MY INTERACTIVE SKILLS.
Nice course and many things are learned
Excellent course to learn about importance of cross cultural communication and why its hard to learn.
Such a good course for building a cross culture comminication
best course and get best knowledge about cross culture communication..........
this course is very usefull for me
i am happy to join coursera

According to me i am very happy to complete this course

Nice course ,it is useful for increasing our skills .
This course is Awesome to learn about culture from other countries . Hofstede cross cross culture is very excellent to learned .
Very useful, with suitable amount of exercises and assignments. Great course for improving English skill.
it was perfect course for me  i learned a lot of think in this course and i hope to learn more

It was an amazing experience to me for the very first time I studied online. I learned a lot. I enjoyed learning with COURSERA. Everything was great!
